<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[1950]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] returns from a stay at [[Michael Tolkien
September: his son]]'s cottage where he made some final revisions to ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' (see [[Letter 134]]).

<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[1951]]''' - First day of the Congrès Internationale de Philologie Moderne at the [[wikipedia:University of Liège
September: University of Liège]], a conference in which [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] delivers the paper "[[Middle English 'Losenger' (essay)
from mind to mind: Robert Browning and J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' is published.

<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[2010]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'' goes free-to-play for the general public in North America.
